1: וּלְאַחְאָ֛ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>And Ahab</n> שִׁבְעִ֥ים <sup>7657 </sup> <n>had seventy</n> בָּנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>in Samaria</n> וַיִּכְתֹּב֩ <sup>3789 </sup> <n>wrote</n> יֵה֨וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>And Jehu</n> סְפָרִ֜ים <sup>5612 </sup> <n>letters</n> וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sent</n> שֹׁמְר֗וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>to Samaria</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שָׂרֵ֤י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>unto the rulers</n> יִזְרְעֶאל֙ <sup>3157 </sup> <n>of Jezreel</n> הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <sup>2205 </sup> <n>to the elders</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> הָאֹמְנִ֥ים <sup>539 </sup> <n>and to them that brought up</n> אַחְאָ֖ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>Ahab's</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>[children] saying</n>
2: וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> כְּבֹ֨א <sup>935 </sup> <n>cometh</n> הַסֵּ֤פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>Now as soon as this letter</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְאִתְּכֶ֖ם <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>113 </sup> <n>to you seeing your master's</n> וְאִתְּכֶם֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> הָרֶ֣כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>[are] with you and [there are] with you chariots</n> וְהַסּוּסִ֔ים <sup>5483 </sup> <n>and horses</n> וְעִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> מִבְצָ֖ר <sup>4013 </sup> <n>a fenced</n> וְהַנָּֽשֶׁק׃ <sup>5402 </sup> <n>also and armour</n>
3: וּרְאִיתֶ֞ם <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Look even out</n> הַטּ֤וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>the best</n> וְהַיָּשָׁר֙ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>and meetest</n> מִבְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>113 </sup> <n>of your master's</n> וְשַׂמְתֶּ֖ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and set</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כִּסֵּ֣א <sup>3678 </sup> <n>throne</n> אָבִ֑יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>[him] on his father's</n> וְהִֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>and fight</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אֲדֹנֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>113 </sup> <n>for your master's</n>
4: וַיִּֽרְאוּ֙ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>afraid</n> מְאֹ֣ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>greatly</n> מְאֹ֔ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>greatly</n> וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הִנֵּה֙ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> שְׁנֵ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>Behold two</n> הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>kings</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> עָמְד֖וּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stood</n> לְפָנָ֑יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>not before</n> וְאֵ֖יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>how</n> נַעֲמֹ֥ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>him how then shall we stand</n> אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n>
5: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>[of the children] sent</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> הַבַּ֣יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>And he that [was] over the house</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֪ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> הָעִ֟יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and he that [was] over the city</n> וְהַזְּקֵנִים֩ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>the elders</n> וְהָאֹמְנִ֨ים <sup>539 </sup> <n>also and the bringers up</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יֵה֤וּא ׀ <sup>3058 </sup> <n>to Jehu</n> לֵאמֹר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>We [are] thy servants</n> אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> וְכֹ֛ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> תֹּאמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>all that thou shalt bid</n> אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to us</n> נַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and will do</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>we will not</n> נַמְלִ֣יךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>king</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>us we will not make any</n> הַטּ֥וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>thou [that which is] good</n> בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in thine eyes</n> עֲשֵֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>do</n>
6: וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>Then he wrote</n> אֲלֵיהֶם֩ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> סֵ֨פֶר ׀ <sup>5612 </sup> <n>a letter</n> שֵׁנִ֜ית <sup>8145 </sup> <n>the second time</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>to them saying</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> לִ֨י אַתֶּ֜ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וּלְקֹלִ֣י ׀ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>unto my voice</n> אַתֶּ֣ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> שֹׁמְעִ֗ים <sup>8085 </sup> <n>If ye [be] mine and [if] ye will hearken</n> קְחוּ֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רָאשֵׁי֙ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>ye the heads</n> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>376 </sup> <n>persons</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>113 </sup> <n>your master's</n> וּבֹ֧אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and come</n> אֵלַ֛י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> כָּעֵ֥ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>this time</n> מָחָ֖ר <sup>4279 </sup> <n>by to morrow</n> יִזְרְעֶ֑אלָה <sup>3157 </sup> <n>to me to Jezreel</n> וּבְנֵ֤י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>Now the king's</n> שִׁבְעִ֣ים <sup>7657 </sup> <n>[being] seventy</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>persons</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> גְּדֹלֵ֥י <sup>1419 </sup> <n>[were] with the great men</n> הָעִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> מְגַדְּלִ֥ים <sup>1431 </sup> <n>which brought them up</n> אוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
7: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּבֹ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <sup>5612 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when the letter</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>to them that they took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king's</n> וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <sup>7819 </sup> <n>and slew</n> שִׁבְעִ֣ים <sup>7657 </sup> <n>seventy</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>persons</n> וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and put</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רָֽאשֵׁיהֶם֙ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>their heads</n> בַּדּוּדִ֔ים <sup>1731 </sup> <n>in baskets</n> וַיִּשְׁלְח֥וּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sent</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יִזְרְעֶֽאלָה׃ <sup>3157 </sup> <n>him [them] to Jezreel</n>
8: וַיָּבֹ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And there came</n> הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>a messenger</n> וַיַּגֶּד־ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and told</n> ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him saying</n> הֵבִ֖יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>They have brought</n> רָאשֵׁ֣י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>the heads</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king's</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> שִׂ֣ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>Lay</n> אֹתָ֞ם <sup>853 </sup> שְׁנֵ֧י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>ye them in two</n> צִבֻּרִ֛ים <sup>6652 </sup> <n>heaps</n> פֶּ֥תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>at the entering in</n> הַשַּׁ֖עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>of the gate</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <sup>1242 </sup> <n>until the morning</n>
9: וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <sup>1242 </sup> <n>And it came to pass in the morning</n> וַיֵּצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>that he went out</n> וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֔ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and stood</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to all the people</n> צַדִּקִ֖ים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>Ye [be] righteous</n> אַתֶּ֑ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֲנִ֜י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> קָשַׁ֤רְתִּי <sup>7194 </sup> <n>behold I conspired</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲדֹנִי֙ <sup>113 </sup> <n>against my master</n> וָאֶהְרְגֵ֔הוּ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>and slew</n> וּמִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> הִכָּ֖ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>him but who slew</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֵֽלֶּה׃ <sup>428 </sup> <n>another</n>
10: דְּע֣וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Know</n> אֵפ֗וֹא <sup>645 </sup> <n>now</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nothing</n> יִפֹּ֜ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>that there shall fall</n> מִדְּבַ֤ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>nothing of the word</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אַ֔רְצָה <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto the earth</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> דִּבֶּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>concerning the house</n> אַחְאָ֑ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>of Ahab</n> וַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>hath done</n> אֵ֚ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> דִּבֶּ֔ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>[that] which he spake</n> בְּיַ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by</n> עַבְדּ֥וֹ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>his servant</n> אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <sup>452 </sup> <n>Elijah</n>
11: וַיַּ֣ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>slew</n> יֵה֗וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>So Jehu</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֤ים <sup>7604 </sup> <n>all that remained</n> לְבֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> אַחְאָב֙ <sup>256 </sup> <n>of Ahab</n> בְּיִזְרְעֶ֔אל <sup>3157 </sup> <n>in Jezreel</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> גְּדֹלָ֖יו <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and all his great men</n> וּמְיֻדָּעָ֣יו <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and his kinsfolks</n> וְכֹהֲנָ֑יו <sup>3548 </sup> <n>and his priests</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> בִּלְתִּ֥י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>without</n> הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>until he left</n> ל֖וֹ שָׂרִֽיד׃ <sup>8300 </sup> <n>him none remaining</n>
12: וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>And he arose</n> וַיָּבֹ֔א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and departed</n> וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>to Samaria</n> ה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בֵּֽית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>court</n> עֵ֥קֶד <sup>7462 </sup> <n>[And] as he [was] at the shearing</n> הָרֹעִ֖ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>of the shepherds</n> בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in the way</n>
13: וְיֵה֗וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>Jehu</n> מָצָא֙ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>met</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲחֵי֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>with the brethren</n> אֲחַזְיָ֣הוּ <sup>274 </sup> <n>of Ahaziah</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> אַתֶּ֑ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>and they</n> וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Who [are] ye?
